GSP28mjnya02u:793: āgneyopāṃśuyājāgnīṣomīyāṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ paurṇamāsīkālavihitānāṃ sahaprayogaḥ ' porṇamāsyā ' ityanena tṛtīyaikavacanāntena vidhīyate /

GSP28mjnya02u:803: tathā hi -- ' samidho yajati ' ' āghāramāghārayati ' ityādayaḥ kālayogarahitāḥ kecidvidhaya āmnātāḥ /

GSP28mjnya02u:1337: upadhānaṃ tu yāgopayuktasya pratipattiḥ sviṣṭakṛdādivat - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1347: yāgau guṇo vā yāgaḥ syādanvayāvyavadhānataḥ // MJaiNy_2,3.19 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1353: tatra paryagnikṛtaśabdena saṃskṛtapaśudravyasya pātnīvataśabdena patnīvannāmakadevatāsaṃbandhasya ca pratīyamānatvādamaṃ yāgavidhiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1359: iha tvālabhyatvena prakṛtaḥ paśuḥ pātnīvataśabdena pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1360: tamanūdya paryagnikṛtaśabdānvitena 'utsṛjanti' ityākhyātena paryagnikaraṇākhyo guṇo vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1361: na ca prakṛtimatasya paryagnikaraṇasya vikṛtau codakena prāptatvādanarthako 'yaṃ vidhiridhivācyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1377: na cānena nyāyena paryagnikaraṇātprācīnānāmapya prāptiriti vācyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1378: vidhīyamānasya paryāgnikaraṇasya nūtanatve satyupakārakalpanāpattyā prakṛtau yatkḷptopakāraṃ paryagnikaraṇaṃ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1380: prakṛtau ca prācīnāṅganantaramādina evopakāraḥ kḷpta ityatrāpi tādṛśasyaiva vidhānātparyāgnikaraṇāntāṅgarītiḥ sidhyati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1381: evaṃ ca sati 'utsṛjanti' ityākhyātena yathoktaparyagnikaraṇavidhāvarthasiddha uparitanāṅgotsargo dhātunānūdyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1388: tadyāgo vā guṇo yāgaḥ syādadābhyāṃśunāmataḥ // MJaiNy_2,3.22 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1392: yo 'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajate' iti 'parā vā etasyā'yuḥ prāṇa eti,
GSP28mjnya02u:1394: tatra- adābhyaśabdasya jyotirādivadapūrvanāmatvāttannāmako yāgo 'yajate' ityākhyātena vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1397: grahaṇaliṅgena jyotiṣṭomavikṛtitvādagatau tadīyavidhyantātideśena tatsiddheḥ - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1405: grahaṇaṃ ca jyotiṣṭomagatasya somarasasya saṃskārarūpo guṇaḥ,
GSP28mjnya02u:1410: athavā-taittirīyāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhakāṇḍe ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake prākaraṇikaṃ viniyojakaṃ vākyaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1413: agnis tu liṅgadarśanāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta / Jaim_2,3.21 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1414: dravyaṃ vā syāc codanāyās tadarthatvāt / Jaim_2,3.22 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1415: tatsaṃyogāt kratus tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharmavidhānāni / Jaim_2,3.23 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1418: agniṃ cinuta ityatra yāgo vā saṃskṛtiyaṃjiḥ /
GSP28mjnya02u:1422: 'ya evaṃ vidvānagniṃ cinute' ityevaṃ vidhāya śrūyate-'athāto 'gnimāgniṣṭomenānuyajati,
GSP28mjnya02u:1432: agnimagniṣṭomenānuyajati' ityatesminvākye 'agniṃ yajati' iti yajisāmānādhikaraṇyāt 'upāṃśu yajati' itivadyāganāmatvam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1436: tasmāt 'agniṃ cinute' ityatrāgnināmako yāga ākhyātena vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1437: cinotistu 'iṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinute' iti vākyaprāptasya cayanasya somayāgavikṛtitvena prāptasya grahasamudāyasyevānuvādaḥ- iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1455: kuṇḍapāyināmayane śrūyate-'upasadbhiścaritvā' 'māsamagnihotraṃ juhoti' 'māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1456: atra- prāptaṃ nityāgnihotramanūdya māsalakṣaṇo guṇo 'prāptatvādvidhīyate - iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1471: kā tarhi nityāgnihotre guṇavidhiśaṅkā - iti cet /
GSP28mjnya02u:1474: tathā sati svataḥsiddhaṃ prakaraṇabhedaṃ nirākṛtya prakaraṇaikyāpādanena guṇaṃ vidhāpayituṃ
GSP28mjnya02u:1475: pravṛttasyāgnihotraśabdasya śaktau nirūddhāyāṃ tadavasthaḥ prakaraṇabhedo nityāgnihotrādidaṃ karma bhinatti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1483: paramārthatastvatra prathamatarapratītena prakaraṇabhedena siddhaṃ karmabhedaṃ guṇabheda upodbalayati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1495: atra - iṣṭīnāṃ prakṛtibhūtadarśapūrṇamāsagatamāgneyayāgamanūdya tatra tejaskāmarūpaṃ phalaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1521: kāmyeṣṭikāṇḍapaṭhiteṣu 'aindrāgnamekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapetprajākāmaḥ' ityādiṣvayameva nyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ // MJaiNyC_2,3.28-29 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1523: saṃnidhau tv avibhāgāt phalārthena punaḥ śrutiḥ / Jaim_2,3.26 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1532: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe deśakālanimittānyāmnāyante- 'same yajeta' paurṇamāsyāṃ yajeta' 'yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1535: sa ca darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ-'śeṣaṃ sviṣṭakṛte samavadyati' iti /
GSP28mjnya02u:1540: tatra-prakaraṇino darśādeḥ pūrvavihitasyaivaibhirvākyaiḥ punarvidhāne 'samidho yajati' ityādivadabhyāsādeva karmabhedaḥ - iti prāpte,
GSP28mjnya02u:1541: brūmaḥ- deśādīnāmavidheyatve 'pi vihitakarmaṇā saha teṣāṃ saṃbandho vidhīyatām /
GSP28mjnya02u:1542: sa ca karmavatpūrve na vihita ityaprāptatvādvidhimarhati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1549: yo 'pi-darśādīnāṃ punarvidhiḥ so 'pi deśādisaṃbandhaṃ vidhātuṃ karmānuvādaḥ - iti na karmabhedamāvahati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1550: samidho 'yajati' ityādau vidheyaguṇāntarābhāvenānuvādāṃsabhavātpunarvidhānaṃ bhedahotuḥ- iti vaiṣamyam // MJaiNyC_2,3.30-32 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1553: avibhāgāt tu karmaṇāṃ dvirukter na vidhīyate / Jaim_2,3.28 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1565: tathā satyāgneyayāgasya darśakāle dviḥprayogaḥ- iti cet / na /
GSP28mjnya02u:1575: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālavistare dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ
GSP28mjnya02u:1580: liṅgadarśanāc ca karmadharme hi prakrameṇa niyamyeta tatrānarthakam anyat syāt / Jaim_2,4.3 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1581: apavarge ca darśayati kālaś cet karmabhedaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.4 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1584: kartus tu niyamāt kālaśāstraṃ nimittaṃ syāt / Jaim_2,4.7 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1587: yāvajjīvaṃ juhotīti dharmaḥ karmaṇi puṃsi vā /
GSP28mjnya02u:1593: tatkālasaṃbandhaśca prakṛte kāmyāgnihotre pūrvamaprāptatvāt 'juhoti' ityanūdite karmaṇi vidhīyate /
GSP28mjnya02u:1594: tathā satyasya vākyasya nityaprayogavidhāyakatvābhāvena vākyāntaravihitaḥ kāmyaprayoga eka evāgnihotrasya paryavasyati /
GSP28mjnya02u:1633: liṅgamaviśiṣṭaṃ sarvaśeṣatvān na hi tatra karmacodanā tasmād dvādaśāhasyāhāravyapadeśaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.24 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1634: dravye cācoditatvād vidhīnām avyavasthā syān nirdeśād vyatiṣṭheta tasmān nityānuvādaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.25 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1640: api vā kramasaṃyogād vidhipṛthaktvam ekasyāṃ vyavatiṣṭheta / Jaim_2,4.31 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1641: virodhinā tv asaṃyogād aikakarmye tatsaṃyogād vidhīnāṃ sarvakarmapratyayaḥ syāt / Jaim_2,4.32 /
GSP28mjnya02u:1646: dṛṣṭaṃ kāṭhakanāmādi bahu bhedasya kāraṇam // MJaiNy_2,4.3 //
GSP28mjnya02u:1661: na hyalpāyuvā manuṣyeṇa sarvaśākhādhyayanapūrvakaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ kartu śakyam /
GSP28mjnya02u:1679: iti śrīmādhavīye jaiminīyanyāyamālāvistare dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
